#include<iostream>
#define mod 1000000007
using namespace std;

long long int expo(long long int base,long long int exp)
{
if(exp==1)
return base;
else
{
if(exp%2==0)
{
long long int base1=expo(base,exp/2);
base1=base1%mod;
base1=(base1*base1)%mod;
return base1%mod;
}
else
{
long long int ans=expo(base,(exp-1)/2);
ans=ans%mod;
ans=(ans*ans)%mod;
base=base%mod;
ans=(base*ans)%mod;
return ans%mod;
}
}
}

long long int func(long long int n)
{
long long int temp=1,temp1=1,temp2=1;
for(int i=1;i<=2*n;i++)
{
if(i<=n+1)
temp1=(temp1*i)%mod;
if(i<=n)
temp2=(temp2*i)%mod;
temp=(temp*i)%mod;
}
temp=(temp*expo(temp2,mod-2))%mod;
temp=(temp*expo(temp1,mod-2))%mod;
return temp;
}

int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
long long int n;
cin>>n;
cout<<func(n)%mod<<endl;
return 0;
}
